text: Ogooué-Ivindo is a province in Gabon. The provincial capital is Makokou. It gets its name from two rivers, the Ogooué and the Ivindo. == Departments == Ogooué-Ivindo is divided into 4 departments: * Ivindo Department (Makokou) * Lope Department (Booué) * Mvoung Department (Ovan) * Zadie Department (Mekambo) == References == Category:Provinces of Gabon
title: Ogooué-Ivindo Province
